title: SHOW_CONTACT_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTON
content:
0xC772A904CDE1186F// ShowContactInstructionalButton
void SHOW_CONTACT_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTON(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: Set to true to show the instructional buttons, or false to hide them.Controls the visibility of the "Contact" instructional buttons on the map screen.NativeDB Introduced: 2545
